scripts.svgr: svgr --svgo-config svgo.config.js --index-template icon-index-template.js --filename-case kebab --out-dir icons_compiled -- icons
scripts.build: npm run svgr && microbundle-crl src/{index,list,utils}.js --no-compress --format modern,cjs
scripts.release-rc: git-branch-is --not main && npm run build && npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease -f --preid=rc && git add . && git commit -m "Version $(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1)" && git tag v$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && git push origin v$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && git push -u origin HEAD
scripts.release: git-branch-is --not main && npm run build && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch -f && git add . && git commit -m "Version $(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1)" && git push -u origin HEAD
scripts.release-no-bump-no-commit: git-branch-is --not main && git tag v$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && git push origin v$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && git push -u origin HEAD
scripts.release-no-bump: git-branch-is --not main && git add . && git commit -m "Version $(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1)" && git tag v$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && git push origin v$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && git push -u origin HEAD
